thread.title: JQH Appoints Nigel Cossey as General Manager at Newly Renovated Courtyard by Marriott Dallas Allen

author: cnbc.com
title: JQH Appoints Nigel Cossey as General Manager at Newly Renovated Courtyard by Marriott Dallas Allen
text:
DALLAS & ALLEN, Texas & SPRINGFIELD, Mo.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts (JQH) today announced Nigel Cossey’s promotion to general manager at the company’s Courtyard by Marriott Dallas Allen at the John Q. Hammons Center in Texas. Located in a thriving suburb north of Dallas, this newly renovated, 2017 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence hotel is in a prime location near the Allen Event Center and The Village at Allen outdoor shopping mall. Cossey most recently served as assistant general manager at JQH’s award-winning Embassy Suites by Hilton San Marcos Hotel, Conference Center & Spa in San Marcos, Texas. He has more than 20 years of hospitality experience, with a specialization in food and beverage operations. Springfield, Missouri-based JQH owns and operates the 228-room/suite Courtyard Dallas Allen property under license from Marriott International, Inc. or one of its affiliates. JQH is a leading private, independent owner and manager of hotels in the United States and also operates more than 1 million square feet of superb meeting space.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180207005966/en/
John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts (JQH) has appointed Nigel Cossey to general manager at the Springfield, Missouri-based company’s newly renovated Courtyard by Marriott Dallas Allen at the John Q. Hammons Center in Texas. He will oversee operations of this 228-room/suite, 2017 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence hotel located in a suburb north of Dallas. Cossey joined JQH in 2015 and has more than 20 years of hospitality experience. He previously served as assistant general manager at JQH’s award-winning Embassy Suites by Hilton San Marcos Hotel, Conference Center & Spa in San Marcos, Texas. (Photo: Business Wire)
“Nigel has an aptitude for mentoring talent that effectively contributes to the nurturing of our inspirational JQH culture,” said Joe Morrissey, JQH’s senior vice president of operations. “He has demonstrated successful leadership in building guest satisfaction and operational profitability. We look forward to continued success from Nigel.”
Prior to Cossey’s promotion to general manager at JQH’s refreshed Courtyard Dallas Allen property, he served as interim general manager at JQH’s 283-suite Embassy Suites by Hilton Hotel, Conference Center & Spa in San Marcos , which features 65,000 square feet of meeting function space. Under his strategic leadership, the hotel received a designation for outstanding profitability performance. Prior to joining JQH in 2015, Cossey was director of food and beverage at the 405-room Myrtle Beach Marriott Resort & Spa at Grand Dunes in Myrtle Beach, South Carolina. His extensive career also includes his role as area director of food and beverage for several properties that were operated by Hospitality Ventures Management Group (HVMG), including the AAA Four Diamond The Shores Resort & Spa in Daytona Beach Shores, Florida.
Cossey is a member of the American Hotel & Lodging Association (AH&LA). He is active in the local lodging community, including participating on boards for The Hotel Association (THA) and the Allen/Fairview Hotel Association. With his extensive food and beverage background, feeding the hungry is a priority with Cossey. He is supportive of JQH’s Legacy of Giving, the philanthropic initiative that allows JQH’s more than 4,000 passionate associates the opportunity to personally get involved in a centralized giving program with Convoy of Hope, where $10 a month can feed a child for an entire month internationally or provide $100 in food, goods and services to a family in need in the United States.
“I am pleased to be in flourishing North Texas overseeing a high quality property within the JQH portfolio,” Cossey said. “I find that JQH truly typifies a family-like culture that provides encouragement, builds on strengths, and fosters trust.”
About Courtyard by Marriott Dallas Allen at the John Q. Hammons Center
Located at 210 East Stacy Road in Allen, JQH’s newly renovated Courtyard by Marriott Dallas Allen at the John Q. Hammons Center is conveniently located near the Allen Event Center and The Village at Allen. Representing the largest meeting space in Allen, the Courtyard Dallas Allen offers nearly 15,000 square feet of recently refurbished event space. Spacious rooms/suites include work space and separate seating areas, luxurious bedding, refrigerators, ergonomic work stations, flat-panel HDTVs, complimentary Wi-Fi, complimentary daily newspaper, and individual climate control. The stylish lobby welcomes guests with flexible spaces to work or to relax with complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy breakfast, dinner and drink service at The Bistro restaurant on-site or shop for food, snacks and refreshments at The Market, a 24-hour access “mini-mart” concept. Other amenities include a full-service business center, indoor swimming pool and whirlpool, and fitness center with cardio equipment, free weights, and medicine and yoga balls. The outdoor patio area features an attractive fire pit. The modern hotel is pet friendly and promotes a complete smoke-free environment within the property. For more information about the Courtyard Dallas Allen, go to www.marriott.com/dalan , connect at www.facebook.com/CourtyardAllen , or call (214) 383-1151.
About John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts
Springfield, Missouri-based John Q. Hammons Hotels & Resorts (JQH) is a leading private, independent owner and manager of hotels in the United States, representing brands such as: Marriott, Hilton, Embassy Suites by Hilton, Sheraton, IHG, Chateau on the Lake Resort / Spa & Convention Center, and Plaza Hotels Collection. With a portfolio of 35 hotels representing approximately 8,500 guest rooms/suites in 16 states, JQH’s properties are dominant in their markets. Founded on the extraordinary vision of John Q. Hammons and built on his continued legacy of excellence spanning more than 50 years, JQH has become one of the most recognized and award-winning companies in the hospitality industry. Built to be the best, JQH continues to set the standard in hospitality management and hotel development.
